summary: The diff shows only infrastructure changes (migration module and project state tracking) but does not implement the actual requirements. Neither the morning show entry (REQ-4) nor the weekday morning schedule entries (REQ-5) have been created. The backend/main.mo file appears truncated and shows only existing CRUD patterns without any new morning show data.

missing_requirements.requirement: Create a new show entry for a morning show with ID, title, description, and optional image
missing_requirements.reason: No new show entry for a morning show was added to the backend shows stable variable. The diff shows no addShow() calls or initial data population for a morning show.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a weekday morning schedule entry for the new morning show with appropriate time slot (e.g., 6:00 AM - 10:00 AM)
missing_requirements.reason: No schedule entries for Monday through Friday morning time slots were created. The diff shows no addSchedule() calls or initial schedule data for weekday mornings.

hallucinated_features.reason: A migration.mo module was added that defines data structures and a run function, but this was not requested in the BuildRequest. The requirement was to use existing data structures, not create migration infrastructure.
